amendment.description: Amendment that sought to decrease all discretionary funding by one percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding levels in the bill by 1% across the board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 68 - 333 (Roll no. 356).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Hefley.
